评论详情: Wore this for my simple private  backyard wedding! It fit great, hubby loved it and I’ll probably wear it as a secondary option for our wedding celebration with family and friends in a few months! It’s not the fanciest but boho, beachy and cute! Just what I was looking for
I got married on the beach back in august and this was the perfect dress! Just had to have it hemmed.  I'm 5'1" and 130 lbs and the size 8 was perfect.

I bought this in a large… I usually wear small or xs! But I wanted it really loose and flowy! I just had the front altered to cover everything! It was so beautiful in photos! ❤️ Just be aware that you can’t exactly wear a bra with it… And it is crochet, so just always be careful about making sure everything is covered! But all in all… it is a very unique, beautiful dress!

评论概述: Not a lot of side coverage
评论详情: Was pretty and inexpensive for beach pictures but not a lot of coverage on the sides.  I just didn't take any side-view pictures. Perfect for what I wanted it for.  Will not be wearing it out in public however.
Very comfortable

评论概述: Love this dress but lots of side boob
评论详情: I had to crotchet about an extra inch of material on each side because of the side boob. Too much side boob. I’m a 32 DD. So there wasn’t much coverage on the sides. Fabric is nice and soft and there’s a sewn in slip which makes it not see through.

Very comfy and flowy! Perfect for the beach! I have a hard time finding dresses that fit since I’m so petite 5’2 100lbs, but this dress fits perfectly! I was worried about washing it but I washed on the delicate cycle and it still looks amazing!!

评论概述: Way too small in the chest!
评论详情: I read some reviews saying a little side boob action is possible, but that was an understatement! I am a 42C and ordered an xl dress. The top covered half of my boob, no joke! It’s a very cute dress but the chest was way too revealing for my family trip! I’m returning and looking for another option.  Also, the actual dress material is the very easily wrinkled linen material so be aware that it can get pretty wrinkled while wearing.

I got this dress for our beach trip, and I’ve worn it three times in two weeks! I’m 5’1 and when it first came it was over my feet and I was disappointed, but I washed/dried it (high heat) and it ended up shrinking a few inches and now hits perfectly at my ankles! Only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is because of the smallish tie at the neck, and the crochet top seems to run a little small on the sides. Other than that, it’s awesome! Also love the color- ended up being more teal than mint green.

评论概述: Cute skirt - top is too small
评论详情: I had read reviews which were mixed. Many people said the top is small and doesn’t cover full boob - and they were right! The skirt is so cute but the top doesn’t fit right.

Always need a few dresses for summer. Got this dress and love it. Super cute and can wear it anywhere. It’s comfortable and light weight. Definitely want more in other colors. I’d say a must have for summer wardrobe.

I Love this dress! The color is amazing and the crochet top is beautiful! The material is great quality. The coverage at the top is perfect for not wearing a bra, but does have less coverage on the sides. I’m 5’2 and the length is perfect, and good to wear with Sandles. Highly recommend l!

评论概述: Super cute on and the color is exactly the same
评论详情: The top is a bit small so size up if you’re well endowed. The length is perfect, color is extly what is pictured. Perfect or Summer outfits or vacation.
Bought this beautiful pink dress for a wedding and does not disappoint. Perfect summer dress! I just ordered in another color.

This dress looks beautiful on the model , I really loved it. But, when it arrived (in a ball ) in person , I noticed the color was not quite the same. Idk how to describe it, more lime greenish. It fit well when I tried it on, however, there were soo many deep wrinkles on it, it looked a mess. I will have to have it professionally pressed before I can ever dream of wearing it 😒 Also, it's Chinese, so the quality of the fabric is non existent. It feels like a cheap pillowcase from Big lots or family dollar . I only really gave it 3 stars cause the fit was comfortable. But it's a very flowing dress,so, sizing is generous to begin with.

This dress is beautiful but the straps were extremely short making it hard to tie which made me concerned that it was going to come untied and let the girls loose. The bust is very small and has no stretch, it would be perfect for an A or B cup size.

Got this for a beach wedding and was terribly disappointed in the odd fit/measurements of this dress. I'm 5'7 and 180lbs so I got a size Large, the dress itself fit nicely around my waist, although it was very long - several inches past the ground - but the top was so oddly ill fitting. I'm a 38DD and somehow the top was incredibly loose, literally falling/dangling off, but the cup area themselves were so small. Unfortunately I missed the return window so I'll probably be trying to alter this myself so that it's wearable.

评论概述: Lots of side boob- cup puckers
评论详情: I absolutely LOVE this dress!! It’s so cute and feels great on my skin. BUT. My mom boobs disagree. :( Without a bra, the dress doesn’t do anything for the girls. Shows lots of side boob, (I’m all for SOME side boob, but you almost see the rose buds!). Maybe it’s just me - but the fabric of the cup also puckers by the armpit area. Probably because the girls aren’t big enough? Idk. Love the dress, just sadly not for me.
I absolutely love the dress, looks much better in person than on the picture. I got a lot of compliments on my vacation about the dress.

Bought this for my beach wedding. It’s soft, light weight and pretty. I love that it is so casual that i can wear it again !

I love this dress! The skirt is straight but still has big flow. The crochet top is nicely made with a relatively thick lining, however it does give side boob. I liked this dress so much I wanted a solution so I searched and found this incredible bralette halter that is the exact same knit as the crochet on the dress! It’s thin enough to wear under the dress and it is a seamless look with no side boob. Holds the girls in!  I ordered both in a small. (The dress is quite long, good with heels) For reference, I am 5’5, 130 pounds, 38 B cup. Here is the Amazon link to the halter top: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BTSVL6QB/ref=ppx_od_dt_b_asin_title_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1

I wanted to love this dress however the top had no support for my boobs and I felt that I was a second away from flashing the world. I am small chested at a B -cup and very comfortable braless in dresses but this was a whole other level!
I wore this dress for my baby shower and my nipples was coming out I had to keep on readjusting it.

Unless you are a size 2 with perky tatas, this is not the dress for you. It runs very small & the girls are barely covered. It's too late for me to return it or I would. (For reference: I am a 36E & typically a size 10.)
I’m going to Cabo to get married and I’m  bringing this dress to wear to dinner one night  definitely a perfect beach dress! Fits true to size, I’m 5’4” and weigh around 120 lbs and ordered a small!

评论概述: Fit At Top Depends on your Build
评论详情: I am 5'5", 189lb and a dress size 12-14 with 36C bra size. I purchased a Medium due to the flowy skirt that gives plenty of room in hip and thigh area (my issue!). This dress fits me PERFECTLY all over with no side boob. I agree, it is long and I am taking 6" off the bottom but in general, I am thrilled with the quality of the fabric and lining. I bought the black/white print and it's very stylish! Can't wait to wear it - I may even purchase it in another color. I can see that yes, over time the halter tie straps will stretch and need to be adjusted but in general, this is a great buy.

Surprisingly I’ve owned mine for 5 years and it’s still white and in good shape.

I’m 5ft 9 inches and weigh 160lbs. The medium was a perfect fit. Ankle length, snug in all the right places and comfy, free flowing in the skirt. I went back to order other colors.

If your thinking of getting this dress just get it quality material very flattering and sexy. Adjustable straps good support I'm a B cup for reference. I'm 5'1 so it's long on me it hits the floor I do need to pick it or get it hemmed a little If I wear flats.

评论概述: I really wanted to love this

Great dress,but can't get past the uncomfortable neck strap and all my boobs hanging out on the side.

评论概述: Really nice but not as ‘fancy’ as advertised
评论详情: This looked much more long and flowy in the Amazon images. It IS very pretty but I wouldn’t use it for a beach wedding. It has no support at all and has a lot of open area on the sides and back. I would not recommend it for large chested ladies. I am 5’3, 170, 36D… I feel that I am not too exposed on the sides but if my chest was any larger, I would be. The material is amazing. It is light and good quality, it is soft like a good pair of bamboo sheets. It is not too see through due to the slip underneath. It is comfortable and very wearable. The tie does loosen after a while of wear so I had to tighten it a few times but I really think it is worth the price for a summer dress!!

I bought this dress in medium for Easter and absolutely loved it!! I tied it at the bottom since I got it a little larger so that I got the length of the dress. Everything about this dress made me feel beautiful and my boyfriend absolutely loved it

评论概述: Overall dress is too long and loose on top

Comfy, beach, everything it appears to be. I would recommend. But I’m 5’6” about 125-130 pounds and a 34D. I ordered a medium and might recommend  a small - the medium was pushing it in length (wore wedge sandals and still felt like I needed to lift up when I walked). I liked the flow but could’ve been a bit tighter and still comfy and give the vibe you want with a dress like this. You’ll have sexy side boob with this dress so if you don’t want that, you’ll need the perfect bra.
